markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Big Mouth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5664) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cheek Pouches](/Feats.aspx?ID=5651)

</column>

---

Instead of storing up to four items of Light Bulk in your cheek pouches, you can store up to 1 Bulk worth of items. The maximum size of a given item is unchanged.
name: Big Mouth
